text: This is the most unfitting song for London I have ever heard.
author: Terry 309

text: When you listen to all the dark music in this game and then get here, you go...oh THERE'S the guy who made RAINBOW CASTLE IN MARIO PARTY!
author: Yophi Smith

text: This is the most upbeat song in the game (it's for a town). All the other music is more haunting, sad or disturbing. The first Shadow Hearts was an amazing game.
author: notyoursavior78

text: Man, this takes me back! Yuri has always been one of my favorite lead male protagonist in a video game. Harmonixer ftw!
author: allthatishere

text: Shadow Hearts is a mediocre game and you should feel meh about it.
author: bulbinking

text: fuck you i'll feel however i want about it.
author: Lapin Angelique

text: This is not what I was expecting from the artwork.
author: PsychadelicoDuck

text: Such a great game. I still need to finish Covenant.
author: redxix88

text: Ahhh, do I miss this series. Being such a fan of Shadow Hearts, I just realized I should really play Koudelka, which is partly a prequel on the Playstation. I've heard it's quite different, but anything that's related to this series is good enough for me.
author: SupraDarky

text: I actually recently tried to play Koudelka since Shadow Hearts 1 and 2 are among my favorite RPGs ever (Love 3 but differently), but Koudelka was kind of hard to get into. It's pretty damn bizarre. Might be worth going through one day though.
author: MrStruggle

text: Here is a fun fact if you didn't know already. Halley (The psychic boy who used a slingshot) is the son of two of the lead characters in Koudelka, Koudelka Lasant and Edward Plunkett!
author: allthatishere

text: Koudelka has fantastic voice acting and graphics for a PS1 so I'd check it out.  It also has a really good storyline too and connects to shadow hearts.
author: Soshi Nine

text: Shadow Hearts 1 and 2 should be played by every JRPG fan. It's turn based but, the story...what can I say?
author: North Star Ken

text: Not to mention Roger Bacon appears in the game as do the Emigre Manuscript and Monastery.
author: AzureVengence2788
